A tiny spider seems to have taken a shine to Hot Rod, Phobia sensed 
power in the new arrival, The way he moved the way he carried 
himself, even the way he spoke showed leadership programming. The 
spider watched his movements until crunch. Hot Rods foot ended the 
existence of this creature on his way to join the battle.

--- In nbwrpg@egroups.com, richard f allen <rfa007@h...> wrote:
> ::Hot Rod::
> 
> Hot Rod gets out of the stasis chamber.
> "I feel mutch better, without dagger's stuck in me." He then relizes
> that he was talking to himself. He goes outside to see if the Pred's
> left. The didn't.
> "Here we go again!"
> Hot Rod runs outside guns blazing.
> "Come on Predicon scum, come and get SLAGED!!"
> 
> (OOC: Ok, sorry sbout the language. I'll cut it down.)
